main.name: Jozi Party Plug
main.bio: Say hello to your one stop party plug in Johannesburg. We are here to help you plan your next party, whether it is a birthday, wedding, or any other event. We have a wide range of services to make your party unforgettable.
main.bio2: We have 360 photo boots, DJ sound systems, photographers, videographers, and more. We are here to make your party planning experience as easy and stress-free as possible.
main.contactMessage: Let us know how you would like to party and we will get back to you in no time.

resume.skillmessage: I have more than a years experience with JavaScript (ReactJS, NodeJS), SQL, C#, and Flutter. Currently I'm working a lot with VueJS for user interface development and maintenance at work. I am also experienced with git source control and Azure Dev Ops and my ideal Operating System are Ubuntu Linux, Arch Linux and MacOS

education.description: At school I spent a lot of time practicing Object Orient Programming. I have been part of a group that went to the Standard Bank Tech Impact Hackathon in 2018.

education.degree: I studied pure Mathematics and Physical Sciences
education.description: In High school I participated a lot in the Escom Science Expo, and in 2015 I won a 3rd place medal at the Regional finals.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: I worked in developing websites for clients that requested websites from the company. So far I developed a website for a modelling academy and I am currently finishing off an E-commerce site for a customer.

work.title: Junior Software Developer
work.description: I work in developing, maintaining and enhancing existing web applications. I also fix bugs assigned to me by the test team to enhance user experience.

testimonials.text: Jozi Party Plug made my 30th birthday absolutely unforgettable! The DJ was amazing, the photo booth was a hit, and everything was set up perfectly. I couldn't have asked for a better celebration!
We hired Jozi Party Plug for our wedding, and it was the best decision we made. Their attention to detail and professionalism made our special day stress-free and magical.
Our company's year-end function was a huge success thanks to Jozi Party Plug. From sound equipment to decorations, everything was top-notch. Our employees are still talking about it!
